full_summary:
Remote Monitoring and Alarm System with Identification Tags 
======================================================

Government Tender Announcement
-----------------------------

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites tenders for the supply, delivery and installation of seven (7) freestanding custom-built display cabinets for the RCMP Headquarters Building in Winnipeg, Manitoba. The cabinets will be used to display RCMP memorabilia for visitors and staff.

Key Features
------------

*   Custom-built display cabinets made of durable materials
*   Seven (7) cabinets will be installed at the RCMP Headquarters Building
*   Cabinets must be built in accordance with specifications and drawings provided
*   Deliverables must be received by August 31, 2023

Security Requirement
--------------------

This tender contains a security requirement. Bidders are expected to provide a detailed plan for how they will ensure the security of the cabinets and the sensitive information they will be displaying.

Evaluation Criteria
-------------------

Tenders will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*   Lowest evaluated price
*   Technical capabilities
*   Bidder's ability to meet the specified security requirements

Submission Requirements
-------------------------

Tenders must be submitted electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at [NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) by May 23, 2023, at 3:00 PM Central Standard Time.

Document Attachments
----------------------

Attachments are available on the Canada Buys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

Procurement Details
---------------------

*   Tender Reference Number: cb-5013-39785880
*   Solicitation Number: M5000-23-5285
*   Tender Closing Date: May 23, 2023, at 3:00 PM Central Standard Time

Contact Information
-------------------

For more information, please contact Vince N Millan, Procurement Officer, at [Vince.Millan@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Vince.Millan@rcmp-grc.gc.gc.ca) or 587-340 3715.

Indigenous Procurement 
-------------------------

The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this tender opportunity. For more information on the Indigenous Business Directory and the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses, please visit [www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](http://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory).

Open-ended Information
